description: Wearing one will be compulsory for most people indoors and out, if social distancing is not possible.
title: Coronavirus: Spain tightens mask rules for all older than five
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain tightens mask rules for all older than five - BBC News
maintext: The World Health Organization says only two groups of people should wear masks - those who are unwell with symptoms and those caring for people suspected to have the virus. It also says medical masks - which are usually much tighter and better made - should be kept for healthcare workers, who are most in need.
